# CozyFocus

> CozyFocus is an offline-first web app focused on deep work sessions, tasks, notes, and calendar insights.

## Canonical URL
- https://cozyfocus.com/

## Crawlable Routes
- https://cozyfocus.com/
- https://cozyfocus.com/files
- https://cozyfocus.com/calendar
- https://cozyfocus.com/roadmap
- https://cozyfocus.com/settings

## Summary
- Focus timer with session tracking.
- Task queue for daily execution.
- Quick notes and file archive for writing.
- Calendar overview with productivity history.
- Local-first data storage and import/export.
